sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 A model of Titanic ship is made to a scale of 1 : 200.\\
 (i) If the length of the model is 1, find the length of the Titanic ship.\\
 (ii) The area of the deck of the actual ship was \(80000m^2\). Find the area of the deck of the model.\\
 (iii) If the volume of the model is \(1.1 m^3\), find the volume of the ship.\\
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{(i) Since,the model of the ship is made to scale 1 : 200,\\}$$
 $$k(Scale factor) = 200\\$$
 $$\text{Length of the ship} = k \times \text{length of the deck}\\
 = \input[s1v1]{} \times 1 = \input[s1v2]{} m$$"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{(ii)}$$
 $$\text{Area of the ship} = k^2 \times \text{Area of the deck}\\$$
 $$\input[s2v1]{} = 200 \times 200 \times \text{Area of the deck}\\$$
 $$\text{Area of the deck} = \input[s2v2]{} m^2$$"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
 $$\text{(iii)}$$ 
 $$\text{Volume of the ship} = k^3 \times \text{Volume of the deck}\\$$
 $$\text{Volume of the ship} = \input[s3v1]{} \times 200 \times 200 \times 1.1\\$$
 $$\text{Volume of the deck} = \input[s3v2]{} m^3$$"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [200, 200], "text": "$$\text{Since, Length of the ship} = k \times \text{length of the deck, therefore, upon putting values we get Length of the ship} = 200 m$$"}, {"data": [80000, 2], "text": "$$\text{Since, Area of the ship} = k^2 \times \text{Area of the deck, therefore, area of the ship} = 2 m^2$$"}, {"data": [200, 8800000.000000002], "text": "$$\text{Since, Volume of the ship }= k^3 \times \text{Volume of the deck, therefore, Volume of the deck} = 8800000.0 m^3$$"}]
